target.name: downloadzfin_mrph
target.description: Downloads files for zfin_mrph to staging area.

target.name: convertzfin_mrph
target.description: Converts FASTA files for zfin_mrph into blastable files in the staging area.

target.name: pushzfin_mrph
target.description: Pushes blast files for zfin_mrph to production from the staging area.

target.name: revertzfin_mrph
target.description: Pulls archived blast files from production to the staging area.
